dcterms:description: A challenging dataset used by various state-of-the-art generalizable NeRF methods to assess their degree of generalization through various distribution of objects in training and testing.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet

dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset contains real-world images taken by phone camera at views lying in an equally spaced grid of a specific size, with 8 scenes available, each having around 20-50 views.
dcterms:title: LLFF

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a collection of images and data for vision and robotics research, providing a benchmark for various tasks including stereo, optical flow, and visual odometry.
dcterms:title: KITTI Raw

dcterms:creator: J. Flynn
M. Broxton

dcterms:description: The Spaces dataset is used for view synthesis with learned gradient descent, providing a set of scenes for evaluating novel view generation techniques.
dcterms:title: Spaces

dcterms:description: IBRcollected is a dataset for learning multi-view image-based rendering, providing a collection of images for training and evaluating rendering techniques.
dcterms:title: IBRcollected

dcterms:creator: T. Zhou
R. Tucker
J. Flynn
G. Fyffe

dcterms:description: RealEstate-4k is a dataset for learning view synthesis using multiplane images, containing a collection of real estate images for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: RealEstate-4k
